# Glen Ellyn History Chatbot ğŸ¨ğŸ§ 

A local-first, open-source chatbot that answers historical questions about Glen Ellyn, Illinois â€” powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Sanborn map data, and a locally running large language model (LLM).

---

## âœ¨ Features

* ğŸ” Ask questions like â€œWhat was at 114 Crescent Blvd in 1929?â€
* ğŸ§  Uses vector search (ChromaDB) and embeddings to retrieve relevant info
* ğŸ¤– Answers are generated by `llama3` running locally via [Ollama](https://ollama.com/)
* ğŸ“† No internet connection or cloud APIs required
* ğŸ—½ Backed by historical Sanborn maps and curated building metadata

## ğŸ“ Project Structure

```bash
glen-ellyn-chatbot/

â”‚   â””â”€â”€ metadata.json        # 1929 building data
```

---

## ğŸ§ª Quick Start

### 1. Clone or download this repo

```bash
cd ~/Projects
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/glen-ellyn-chatbot.git
cd glen-ellyn-chatbot
```

### 2. Create and activate virtual environment

```bash
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
```

### 3. Install dependencies

```bash
pip install --break-system-packages chromadb sentence-transformers requests
```

### 4. Run the chatbot

```bash
python rag/rag_query.py
```

### 5. Ask a question

```bash
> What was at 114 Crescent Blvd in 1929?
```

---

## âš™ï¸ Requirements

* Python 3.8+
* [Ollama](https://ollama.com/) with `llama3` model installed:

  ```bash
  ollama run llama3
  ```

* ğŸ—½ 1929 Sanborn Fire Insurance Map of Glen Ellyn
* ğŸ© Metadata manually curated from historical map annotations
* ğŸ“š Source: Library of Congress + Glen Ellyn Historical Society
